member.name: T:SlncsGen.ScriptGlobals
member.summary: Globals passed into the Slncs C# script at execution time. The script writes the generated solution using as the target .slnx file.

member.name: P:SlncsGen.ScriptGlobals.OutputPath
member.summary: The fully qualified path where the generator should write the produced .slnx file. Provided by the hosting generator runner.
